title: Where Are New Conversations with Colin and Oreo Orations?
description:
Holy cow, chemotherapy sucks. It's so bad, Greg's taking a break from A Conversation with Colin and Oreo Oration -- but just until we get to 2013. Get the full scoop!

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

- A Conversation with Colin -
Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.

Follow us on Twitter
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/notaxation

#AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

- Oreo Oration - 
While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

#OreoOration Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&feature=plcp

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

transcript_chunks.text: oh hi there it's me Greg Miller Game Over Greggy here on that there internet you know we've had a lot of good times in this kitchen table with the old conversations with Colin the Oreo Oration we have a lot more good times in the future but as many of you know I've been fighting this year cancer the Cancer's gone still doing a lot of chemotherapy for the cancer and it's getting to the point ladies and gentlemen where these final chemos are just beating the living out of me it's it's rough so what I found is that I got no energy to come home and edit videos for conversation with Colin for Oreo Oration not canceling these shows mind you these shows are still very much in production but we're going to take a break till 2013 when I'm back on uh the healthy train there as healthy as somebody who eats chicken wings and pizza every other day can be so don't panic the shows will be back in 2013 but we're going to take our we're going to take our winter break here just like Nashville just did over on

chicken wings and pizza every other day can be so don't panic the shows will be back in 2013 but we're going to take our winter break here just like Nashville did over on ABC great show if you're not watching Nashville by the way please watch Nashville uh while you wait for more orations while you wait for more conversations with Colin make sure you subscribe to my channel right here then make sure you click here to go to the Conversation With Colin playlist then click here go to the Oreo Oration playlist uh plenty of content there I'm sure you've missed a few episodes no big deal you go get them the best part about of course the oration ones is a lot of people have left video responses since we started doing that so go back look at old episodes look at what people said you click on oh my gosh look at that Casey Wayan he's talking about Oreo Orations and Oreos there I like that uh you know for sure on this video feel free to leave the Oreos that I'm missing

said you click on oh my gosh look at that Casey Wayan he's talking about orations and Oreos there I like that uh you know for sure on this video feel free to leave the Oreos that I'm missing that I still need to review on this video Feel Free leave conversations with Colin you'd like to see that guy's crazy I'd love to see what else he has to say but you have to tell us what it is so we've covered the big things don't worry not I'm not dead that's the good thing not dead yet uh coming back uh tired very tired so I'm going to break till 2013 conversation with Colin subscribe oration subscribe while you wait we will continue over on that thing called start youtube.com/ start to do up at noon every Monday go check that out I host a show there Mike Ducker writes it Brian Alano is fat on it um um and until then I mean just keep it on YouTube subscribe to Game Over Greggy follow me on Twitter all that stuff I godamn these kids in this house thank you good night
